metadata.Title: CVE-2021-29983 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: Firefox for Android could get stuck in fullscreen mode and not exit it evenafter normal interactions that should cause it to exit. *Note: This issueonly affected Firefox for Android. Other operating systems areunaffected.*. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 91.

criterions.comment: mozjs38 package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs52: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
